channel.title: Wired and Wireless PC File sharing
channel.description: I can't get much help from Google and I don't have much time to go to the library. It's a burden to plug my flash drive over and over. How can I grant file sharing between a netbook(using wifi) and a desktop(connected to a modem)?

item.title: Wired and Wireless PC File sharing
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
Yeah if your just moving smaller files around drop box will save you the headache. If you have larger files then you might want to treat your pc as a server and use something like FTP.

Sent from my phone using Tapatalk

Read full topic
item.source: Wired and Wireless PC File sharing

item.title: Wired and Wireless PC File sharing
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
You could use dropbox like some of us.
Default free plan is 2gb’s, with a referral it’s 2.5 though.

Referral link: https://db.tt/SghbaL2s

Read full topic
item.source: Wired and Wireless PC File sharing
